lines.text: Don't those society folks have big weddings!
Yeah, but us hoodlums have the swell funerals.
What difference does it make... Whether laws are made by a bunch of lawyers for other lawyers to break, or whether they're made by hoodlums for other hoodlums. They're all man-made laws.
I'll bet we'll be the best-dressed people there. That's all anybody goes to the opera for.
I thought they only went to hear the music.
Sure, but those people sit up in the balcony.
I wish to report that we are making satisfactory progress. Of course, it must be born in mind that this project is still in its infancy. I mean, we ain't got a cent yet.
Say, baby, what do you do with your spare moments?
I like to go to wrestling matches.
If you listen to me, you sucker, you're going to be doing all right.
No, I think I'd like to let the prison doctor do that.
Never argue with a truck driver. They're always right.
